h2: At beggining time don't make your work very hectic make a proper schedule and try to follow it because even you study for less time but consistency is more important.
Don't be limited to your studies only explore other things and also try to participate in online events and contests like github campus expert and many more.
Never copy code from google without understanding, you can take hint and do by your own.
If you have any doubt related to a program then don't ask for the code instead ask for the approach and do by yourself.
Never take aptitude forgranted, because the first round in any interview is the aptitude round, so be prepared with aptitude subjects also.
Don't understimate the college semester exams..you must maintain a good CGPA during your semester exams, because it will help in your further studies.
Don't take interviews very casually, be prepared with your professional personality.
